metadata.description: When Eiji Hoshimiya was asked his heart's desire, the young boy could never have predicted the catastrophic consequences. Ten years after the 'Great Destruction,' the world has been reshaped with gifted individuals called 'Orders' emerging, people capable to reshaping reality to their whims.When some of these Orders start hunting Eiji, though will he have to summon the power that nearly destroyed the world?
metadata.name: Big Order
